name: Get base 64 img output
Display image
draw out frame
format:
<template>
    <canvas id="objectCanvas" width="640 px" height="640 px">
    </canvas>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    mounted() {
        this.$nextTick(() => {
            const canvas = document.getElementById('objectCanvas');
            if (!canvas) {
                console.error("Canvas element not found");
                return;
            }
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

            // Define class colors
            const classColors = {
                person: "#ff0000", bicycle: "#00ff00", car: "#0000ff", motorcycle: "#ffff00", airplane: "#ff00ff",
                bus: "#00ffff", train: "#800000", truck: "#808000", boat: "#800080", "traffic light": "#008080",
                "fire hydrant": "#c0c0c0", "stop sign": "#ffa500", "parking meter": "#a52a2a", bench: "#008000",
                bird: "#000080", cat: "#ff6347", dog: "#4682b4", horse: "#daa520", sheep: "#5f9ea0", cow: "#9acd32",
                elephant: "#6a5acd", bear: "#7fffd4", zebra: "#8b4513", giraffe: "#b8860b", backpack: "#556b2f",
                umbrella: "#2e8b57", handbag: "#66cdaa", tie: "#4682b4", suitcase: "#8a2be2", frisbee: "#d2691e",
                skis: "#dc143c", snowboard: "#00008b", "sports ball": "#006400", kite: "#8b008b", "baseball bat": "#9932cc",
                "baseball glove": "#9400d3", skateboard: "#ff1493", surfboard: "#00ced1", "tennis racket": "#1e90ff",
                bottle: "#ff4500", "wine glass": "#2f4f4f", cup: "#8b0000", fork: "#cd5c5c", knife: "#4b0082",
                spoon: "#800080", bowl: "#e9967a", banana: "#f4a460", apple: "#ff6347", sandwich: "#8a2be2",
                orange: "#ff4500", broccoli: "#32cd32", carrot: "#228b22", "hot dog": "#b22222", pizza: "#ff8c00",
                donut: "#f08080", cake: "#ff69b4", chair: "#6b8e23", couch: "#3cb371", "potted plant": "#8fbc8f",
                bed: "#00fa9a", "dining table": "#adff2f", toilet: "#7fff00", tv: "#7cfc00", laptop: "#00ff7f",
                mouse: "#00bfff", remote: "#1e90ff", keyboard: "#4682b4", "cell phone": "#5f9ea0", microwave: "#6495ed",
                oven: "#dc143c", toaster: "#ff7f50", sink: "#ff6347", refrigerator: "#ff4500", book: "#8b4513",
                clock: "#a52a2a", vase: "#ff6347", scissors: "#9932cc", "teddy bear": "#8a2be2", "hair drier": "#9400d3",
                toothbrush: "#ff1493"
            };

            const classNames = Object.keys(classColors);

            this.$watch('msg.payload', (data) => {
                if (data && data.boxes) {
                    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);

                    const scaleX = canvas.width / data.originalWidth;
                    const scaleY = canvas.height / data.originalHeight;

                    data.boxes.forEach((box) => {
                        const [cx, cy, width, height, confidence, classId] = box;
                        const className = classNames[classId] || "unknown";
                        const color = classColors[className] || "#ffffff"; // Default to white if class not found

                        // Calculate top-left corner and scale
                        const x = (cx - width / 2) * scaleX;
                        const y = (cy - height / 2) * scaleY;
                        const w = width * scaleX;
                        const h = height * scaleY;

                        // Draw bounding box
                        ctx.strokeStyle = color;
                        ctx.lineWidth = 2;
                        ctx.strokeRect(x, y, w, h);

                        // Draw label
                        ctx.fillStyle = color;
                        ctx.font = '14px Arial';
                        const label = `${className} (${confidence.toFixed(2)})`;
                        ctx.fillText(label, x + 5, y - 5);
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    }
};
</script>

<style>
canvas {
    z-index: 2;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    width: 640;
    height: 640;
}
</style>

name: Get detection box info

classes: person,bicycle,car,motorcycle,airplane,bus,train,truck,boat,traffic light,fire hydrant,stop sign,parking meter,bench,bird,cat,dog,horse,sheep,cow,elephant,bear,zebra,giraffe,backpack,umbrella,handbag,tie,suitcase,frisbee,skis,snowboard,sports ball,kite,baseball bat,baseball glove,skateboard,surfboard,tennis racket,bottle,wine glass,cup,fork,knife,spoon,bowl,banana,apple,sandwich,orange,broccoli,carrot,hot dog,pizza,donut,cake,chair,couch,potted plant,bed,dining table,toilet,tv,laptop,mouse,remote,keyboard,cell phone,microwave,oven,toaster,sink,refrigerator,book,clock,vase,scissors,teddy bear,hair drier,toothbrush
